item.title: ...if looks could kill (selfies actually can kill you)
item.description: A 2018 paper in the Journal of Family Medicine and Primary Care looked into the rates of selfie-related deaths around the world and found some surprising results. Selfies: A boon or bane? was authored by Agam Bansal, Chandan Garg, Abhijith Pakhare, and Samiksha Gupta from Community and Family Medicine, All India Institute of Medical Sciences, Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh, India and the Department of Civil Engineering, IIT Kanpur, Kanpur, Uttar Pradesh, India.
